results.title: Commodore C2N Datasette
results.brief_description: The Commodore 1530 (C2N) Datasette, later also Datassette (a portmanteau of data and cassette), is Commodore’s dedicated magnetic tape data storage device. Using compact cassettes as the storage medium, it provides inexpensive storage to Commodore’s 8-bit home/personal computers, notably the PET, VIC-20, and C64.
results.description: The Commodore 1530 (C2N) Datasette, later also Datassette (a portmanteau of data and cassette), is Commodore’s dedicated magnetic tape data storage device. Using compact cassettes as the storage medium, it provides inexpensive storage to Commodore’s 8-bit home/personal computers, notably the PET, VIC-20, and C64.
description_for_label: The Commodore 1530 (C2N) Datasette, later also Datassette (a portmanteau of data and cassette), is Commodore’s dedicated magnetic tape data storage device. Using compact cassettes as the storage medium, it provides inexpensive storage to Commodore’s 8-bit home/personal computers, notably the PET, VIC-20, and C64.
